channel.title: XRechnung on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in XRechnung on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: New and planned
item.description: New and planned Planned March 2024 Setup assistant (wizard) Released versions Version 2.9.0.0 - 01.03.2024 Establish compatibility with the new Easy Batch version Version 2.8.0.6 - 02.02.2024 New features: Load XRechnung version 3.0 as default value Version 2.8.0.3 - 11.12.2023 Corrections: The definded email subject from Mail Subject Plus will now set for XRechnung as well. Version 2.8.0.2 - 06.11.2023 Corrections: Correction of the display of XRechnung status in role center:

item.title: Videos
item.description: Videos Here you can find some informative videos about our XRechnung, each video covers a special topic Setup & Sending
